Doctrinal Grounding
 

     Give Bible studies to the newly converted to fully and firmly establish them in the truth.--Direct the mind to Him who guides and controls all things. Christ will be the manna and the spiritual dew to these newly
206
converted souls. In Him is no darkness at all. As men of spiritual understanding conduct Bible studies with them, telling them how to yield to the power of the Holy Spirit, that they may be fully and firmly established in the truth, the power of God will be revealed.--Ev 284.
